scripts.env:dev: NODE_ENV=dev node scripts/config.js && cp public/static/config/index.js public/static/config/index.dev.js
scripts.env:qa: NODE_ENV=qa node scripts/config.js && cp public/static/config/index.js public/static/config/index.qa.js
scripts.env:sandbox: NODE_ENV=sandbox node scripts/config.js && cp public/static/config/index.js public/static/config/index.sandbox.js
scripts.env:stage: NODE_ENV=stage node scripts/config.js && cp public/static/config/index.js public/static/config/index.stage.js
scripts.env:test: NODE_ENV=test node scripts/config.js && cp public/static/config/index.js public/static/config/index.test.js
scripts.env:prod: NODE_ENV=prod node scripts/config.js && cp public/static/config/index.js public/static/config/index.prod.js
scripts.allenvs: npm run env:sandbox && npm run env:prod && npm run env:qa && npm run env:stage && npm run env:test && npm run env:dev
